Info

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

hmtx/CFF

Advance width

Advance width of hmtx and CFF table should be the same (tolerance 2 units).

This is a TrueType font. This test is only for CFF.

Info

Error

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Check double NULL

Font does not have NULL at all. Please investigate.

Error

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

glyf

Contours

.notdef should be TOFU.

Not Monotype standard TOFU. .notdef has 10 contours. It might be the GlyphsApp branding. Please investigate.

Pass

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

hmtx

Advance

ZERO WIDTH SPACE advance width should be 0

Advance width is '0'

Error

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

cmap

FEFF

ZERO WIDTH NO-BREAK SPACE: Missing FEFF in cmap table.

Required for Monotype library. Please add unicode FEFF. Custom work refer to spec.

Pass

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

cmap

00AD

Soft hyphen 00AD in cmap table.

Soft hyphen is often used in web and in professional print publishing software like Adobe InDesign.

Error

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

hmtx

Index 1 and 584

Advance width of nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) should match the space (uni0020) width.

Advance width nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) 300 ≠ space (uni0020) 225.
If the width matches the original font, it does not need to be changed.

Warning

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

hmtx

Index 1 and 585

Advance width of 'thinspace' (uni2009) should be smaller than the advance width of 'space' (uni0020).

Advance width 'thinspace' 150 is smaller than 'space' 225, but should be 60% of space '135.0'. Please verify if this is intend to be like it is.

Warning

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

hmtx

Index 1 and 583

Advance width of 'hairspace' (uni200A) should be smaller than the advance width of 'space' (uni0020).

Advance width 'hairspace' 75 is smaller than 'space' 225, but should be 30% of space '67.5'. Please verify if this is intend to be like it is.

Info

Can not check, because no uni2004 in this font.

00AD

Soft hyphen 00AD in cmap table.

Soft hyphen is often used in web and in professional print publishing software like Adobe InDesign.

Error

Arima Madurai ExtraLight Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight.ttf)

hmtx

Index 1 and 584

Advance width of nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) should match the space (uni0020) width.

Advance width nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) 298 ≠ space (uni0020) 224.
If the width matches the original font, it does not need to be changed.

Warning

Arima Madurai ExtraLight Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight.ttf)

hmtx

Index 1 and 585

Advance width of 'thinspace' (uni2009) should be smaller than the advance width of 'space' (uni0020).

Advance width 'thinspace' 149 is smaller than 'space' 224, but should be 60% of space '134.4'. Please verify if this is intend to be like it is.

Warning

Arima Madurai ExtraLight Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight.ttf)

hmtx

Index 1 and 583

Advance width of 'hairspace' (uni200A) should be smaller than the advance width of 'space' (uni0020).

Advance width 'hairspace' 75 is smaller than 'space' 224, but should be 30% of space '67.2'. Please verify if this is intend to be like it is.

Info

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

CFF

Alignment Zones

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

Info

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

glyf

-/-

Glyphs (LATIN) which are made from components.
Great.

'Aacute' (uni00C1) (ID 4)
'Abreve' (uni0102) (ID 5)
'Acircumflex' (uni00C2) (ID 12)
'Adieresis' (uni00C4) (ID 18)
'Agrave' (uni00C0) (ID 20)
'Amacron' (uni0100) (ID 22)
'Aring' (uni00C5) (ID 24)
'Atilde' (uni00C3) (ID 25)

OK: '.notdef' advance width is 600.

OS/2 table

OS/2 table

Error

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

table version 3.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

'OS/2' table version is: 3. Verify that this is the version required.

Pass

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

usDefaultChar

'OS/2' usDefaultChar should be 0x0000.

OK: 'OS/2' usDefaultChar is 0x0000.

Pass

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

usFirstCharIndex

'OS/2' usFirstCharIndex should be 0x0020

OK: 'OS/2' usFirstCharIndex is 0x0020.

Pass

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

usLastCharIndex

'OS/2' usLastCharIndex should be 0xFB02

OK: 'OS/2' usLastCharIndex is 0xFB02.

Error

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Installable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

Info

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

OS/2

fsType

Pull 'OS/2' fsType.

embedding level: Embedding Level = Installable Embedding
no subsetting flag: False
bitmap embedding only flag: False

Error

Arima Madurai ExtraLight Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

table version 3.

'OS/2' table version is: 3. Verify that this is the version required.

Pass

Arima Madurai ExtraLight Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Error

Arima Madurai ExtraLight Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Installable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

Info

Arima Madurai ExtraLight Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight.ttf)

OS/2

fsType

Pull 'OS/2' fsType.

embedding level: Embedding Level = Installable Embedding
no subsetting flag: False
bitmap embedding only flag: False

Error

Arima Madurai Light Regular (ArimaMadurai-Light.ttf)

OS/2

table version 3.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

'OS/2' table version is: 3. Verify that this is the version required.

Pass

Arima Madurai Light Regular (ArimaMadurai-Light.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Arima Madurai Light Regular (ArimaMadurai-Light.ttf)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

'OS/2' usDefaultChar should be 0x0000.

OK: 'OS/2' usDefaultChar is 0x0000.

fvar table

fvar table

Info

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

fvar

variable font

Variable font must have a fvar table.

This font is not a variable font.

Info

This font is not a variable font.

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Arima Madurai ExtraLight Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight.ttf)

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap Table

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap Table

Error

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

cmap

cmap(0, 3, 0)

Missing uni0000 and uni000D in cmap MS/BMP(0,3,0) and Unicode/2.0, BMP only(3,1,0).

Please verify with spec or Project Manager if uni0000 is required, if so: PLEASE ADD.

Error

Please verify with spec or Project Manager if uni000D is required, if so: PLEASE ADD.

Obsolete Language Tag TUR

Obsolete Language Tag TUR

Pass

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Copyright 2015 The Arima Project Authors (info@ndiscovered.com)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

'Regular'

name

Mac NID 4

NID 4 'Arima Madurai Thin' = NID 1 'Arima Madurai' + 'space' + NID 2 'Thin'

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

name

Mac NID 5, Version

'Version' has leading or trailing spaces.

leading or trailing spaces are highlighted with [  ]:
'Version 1.020; ttfautohint (v1.5) -l 7 -r 28 -G 50 -x 13 -D latn -f none -w G -X [""]'

Pass

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 1.020; ttfautohint (v1.5) -l 7 -r 28 -G 50 -x 13 -D latn -f none -w G -X ""' does match fontRevision 'Version 1.02'.

Pass

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '17'
'ArimaMadurai-Thin'

Pass

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ArimaMadurai-Thin', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ArimaMadurai-Thin', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'NDISCOVER', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is www.ndiscover.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'NDISCOVER' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Arima Madurai' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Thin' = NID 1 'Arima Madurai Thin'.

Pass

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright 2015 The Arima Project Authors (info@ndiscovered.com)'
MS is: 'Copyright 2015 The Arima Project Authors (info@ndiscovered.com)'

Error

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 1

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'Arima Madurai'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Arima Madurai Thin'

Error

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 2

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'Thin'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Regular'

Pass

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 3

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: '1.020;NDIS;ArimaMadurai-Thin'
MS is: '1.020;NDIS;ArimaMadurai-Thin'

Pass

MS is: 'Arima Madurai Thin'

MS is: 'Version 1.020; ttfautohint (v1.5) -l 7 -r 28 -G 50 -x 13 -D latn -f none -w G -X ""'

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'www.ndiscover.com'
MS is: 'www.ndiscover.com'

Pass

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL'
MS is: 'This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL'

Pass

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 14

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'http://scripts.sil.org/OFL'
MS is: 'http://scripts.sil.org/OFL'

Error

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 16

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Arima Madurai'

Error

Arima Madurai ExtraLight Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight.ttf)

'ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight'

Pass

Arima Madurai ExtraLight Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arima Madurai ExtraLight Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arima Madurai ExtraLight Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'NDISCOVER', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Arima Madurai ExtraLight Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is www.ndiscover.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arima Madurai ExtraLight Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 12

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is www.ndiscover.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arima Madurai ExtraLight Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'NDISCOVER' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Arima Madurai ExtraLight Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

MS NID 11

NID 11 is www.ndiscover.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arima Madurai ExtraLight Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is www.ndiscover.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arima Madurai ExtraLight Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'NDISCOVER' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Arima Madurai ExtraLight Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Arima Madurai ExtraLight Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Arima Madurai ExtraLight Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Arima Madurai' + 'Space' + NID 17 'ExtraLight' = NID 1 'Arima Madurai ExtraLight'.

Pass

Arima Madurai ExtraLight Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright 2015 The Arima Project Authors (info@ndiscovered.com)'
MS is: 'Copyright 2015 The Arima Project Authors (info@ndiscovered.com)'

Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'Arima Madurai'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Arima Madurai ExtraLight'

Error

Arima Madurai Light Regular (ArimaMadurai-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '18'
'ArimaMadurai-Light'

Pass

Arima Madurai Light Regular (ArimaMadurai-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ArimaMadurai-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arima Madurai Light Regular (ArimaMadurai-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ArimaMadurai-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arima Madurai Light Regular (ArimaMadurai-Light.ttf)

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Arima Madurai Light Regular (ArimaMadurai-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'NDISCOVER', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Arima Madurai Light Regular (ArimaMadurai-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is www.ndiscover.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arima Madurai Light Regular (ArimaMadurai-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 12

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is www.ndiscover.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arima Madurai Light Regular (ArimaMadurai-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'NDISCOVER' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Arima Madurai Light Regular (ArimaMadurai-Light.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arima Madurai Light Regular (ArimaMadurai-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2015 The Arima Project Authors (info@ndiscovered.com)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Arima Madurai Light Regular (ArimaMadurai-Light.ttf)

MS NID 6

Pass

Arima Madurai Light Regular (ArimaMadurai-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ArimaMadurai-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arima Madurai Light Regular (ArimaMadurai-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ArimaMadurai-Light', Everything looks good.

Pass

name

MS NID 8

Arima Madurai Light Regular (ArimaMadurai-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'NDISCOVER' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Arima Madurai Light Regular (ArimaMadurai-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Arima Madurai Light Regular (ArimaMadurai-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Arima Madurai Light Regular (ArimaMadurai-Light.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Arima Madurai' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Light' = NID 1 'Arima Madurai Light'.

Pass

name

Arima Madurai Regular (ArimaMadurai-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.

NID 6 length is '20'
'ArimaMadurai-Regular'

Pass

Arima Madurai Regular (ArimaMadurai-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ArimaMadurai-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arima Madurai Regular (ArimaMadurai-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ArimaMadurai-Regular', Everything looks good.

Pass

Error

Arima Madurai Regular (ArimaMadurai-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'NDISCOVER', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Arima Madurai Regular (ArimaMadurai-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is www.ndiscover.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arima Madurai Regular (ArimaMadurai-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 12

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is www.ndiscover.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arima Madurai Regular (ArimaMadurai-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'NDISCOVER' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Arima Madurai Regular (ArimaMadurai-Regular.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arima Madurai Regular (ArimaMadurai-Regular.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2015 The Arima Project Authors (info@ndiscovered.com)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Arima Madurai Regular (ArimaMadurai-Regular.ttf)

name

'Arima Madurai'

Designer is present.

Error

name

Description NID 10 (MS/BMP/English (U.S.)) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

name

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Copyright 2015 The Arima Project Authors (info@ndiscovered.com)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Arima Madurai Medium Regular (ArimaMadurai-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '19'
'ArimaMadurai-Medium'

Pass

Arima Madurai Medium Regular (ArimaMadurai-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ArimaMadurai-Medium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arima Madurai Medium Regular (ArimaMadurai-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ArimaMadurai-Medium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arima Madurai Medium Regular (ArimaMadurai-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'NDISCOVER', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Arima Madurai Medium Regular (ArimaMadurai-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is www.ndiscover.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arima Madurai Medium Regular (ArimaMadurai-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'NDISCOVER' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Arima Madurai Medium Regular (ArimaMadurai-Medium.ttf)

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'NDISCOVER' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Arima Madurai Medium Regular (ArimaMadurai-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Arima Madurai Medium Regular (ArimaMadurai-Medium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Arima Madurai' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Medium' = NID 1 'Arima Madurai Medium'.

Pass

Arima Madurai Medium Regular (ArimaMadurai-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright 2015 The Arima Project Authors (info@ndiscovered.com)'
MS is: 'Copyright 2015 The Arima Project Authors (info@ndiscovered.com)'

Error

Arima Madurai Medium Regular (ArimaMadurai-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 1

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'Arima Madurai'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Arima Madurai Medium'

Error

Arima Madurai Medium Regular (ArimaMadurai-Medium.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 2

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'Medium'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Regular'

Pass

MS is: '1.020;NDIS;ArimaMadurai-Medium'

Arima Madurai Medium Regular (ArimaMadurai-Medium.ttf)

name

Macintosh NID 0 (Mac/Roman/English)

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Macintosh NID 0, Copyright' (Mac/Roman/English)

Copyright is present.

Pass

Arima Madurai Bold (ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Copyright 2015 The Arima Project Authors (info@ndiscovered.com)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Arima Madurai Bold (ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Mac NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '13'
'Arima Madurai'

Pass

Arima Madurai Bold (ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Roman'

Pass

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Italic, Extra, Light, Black, Thin, Wide, Ultra'

Pass

Arima Madurai Bold (ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Arima Madurai Bold (ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Sm, Ultra, Semi, Ex, Demi, Extra, Dm, X, Xtra'

Pass

Arima Madurai Bold (ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf)

name/OS/2

Mac NID 1

Width Names Family Name NID1

OS/2 usWidthClass seems to be correct. Cannot find any specific width name in the name:
'Arima Madurai'

Pass

'Arima Madurai Bold'

Arima Madurai Bold (ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Arima Madurai Bold' = NID 1 'Arima Madurai' + 'space' + NID 2 'Bold'

Pass

Arima Madurai Bold (ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf)

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 1.020' does match fontRevision 'Version 1.02'.

Pass

Arima Madurai Bold (ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '17'
'ArimaMadurai-Bold'

Pass

Arima Madurai Bold (ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ArimaMadurai-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arima Madurai Bold (ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ArimaMadurai-Bold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arima Madurai Bold (ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Arima Madurai Bold (ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Arima Madurai Bold (ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Error

Arima Madurai Bold (ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'NDISCOVER', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Arima Madurai Bold (ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is www.ndiscover.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arima Madurai Bold (ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 12

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is www.ndiscover.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arima Madurai Bold (ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'NDISCOVER' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Arima Madurai Bold (ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arima Madurai Bold (ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'NDISCOVER' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Arima Madurai Bold (ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Arima Madurai Bold (ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 0

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Copyright 2015 The Arima Project Authors (info@ndiscovered.com)'
MS is: 'Copyright 2015 The Arima Project Authors (info@ndiscovered.com)'

Pass

Arima Madurai Bold (ArimaMadurai-Bold.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 1

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Arima Madurai'
MS is: 'Arima Madurai'

Pass

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is 'Copyright 2015 The Arima Project Authors (info@ndiscovered.com)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

'Arima Madurai'

Pass

'Arima Madurai'

Error

'Regular'
'Italic'
'Bold'
'Bold Italic'

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Arima Madurai ExtraBold' = NID 1 'Arima Madurai' + 'space' + NID 2 'ExtraBold'

Pass

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

Pass

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '22'
'ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold'

Pass

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'NDISCOVER', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 11

Mac NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is www.ndiscover.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 12

Mac NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is www.ndiscover.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'NDISCOVER' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '22'
'ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold'

Pass

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

MS NID 8 is 'NDISCOVER', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 11

MS NID 11, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 11 is www.ndiscover.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is www.ndiscover.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'NDISCOVER' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Arima Madurai' + 'Space' + NID 17 'ExtraBold' = NID 1 'Arima Madurai ExtraBold'.

Pass

Arima Madurai Black Regular (ArimaMadurai-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'ArimaMadurai-Black', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arima Madurai Black Regular (ArimaMadurai-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'ArimaMadurai-Black', Everything looks good.

Pass

Arima Madurai Black Regular (ArimaMadurai-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

Mac NID 8 is 'NDISCOVER', but should be one of these: 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited', 'Monotype GmbH', 'MyFonts Inc.', 'MyFonts Inc', 'Fontsmith Ltd.', 'Fontsmith Ltd'.

Error

name

NID 11 is www.ndiscover.com, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Arima Madurai Black Regular (ArimaMadurai-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8/13

License text

Cannot check license text because of unkown entity 'NDISCOVER' (NID8). Please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Arima Madurai Black Regular (ArimaMadurai-Black.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Arima Madurai Black Regular (ArimaMadurai-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2015 The Arima Project Authors (info@ndiscovered.com)'
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

'Arima Madurai Black'

, most common Monotype license test is:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. Arima Madurai Black Regular (ArimaMadurai-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Arima Madurai Black Regular (ArimaMadurai-Black.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Arima Madurai' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Black' = NID 1 'Arima Madurai Black'.

Pass

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Windows NID 10, Description' (MS/BMP/English (U.S.))

Description NID 10 (MS/BMP/English (U.S.)) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Pass

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Error

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

GPOS

kern

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

GPOS table does not have kerning feature. Please investigate if this meets requirements.

Info

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in font.

Font has no 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.

Pass

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

OS/2 and head

sTypeAsc/Desc and unitsPerEm

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value.

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender (1633) match or exceed the unitsPerEm value (1000).

Info

Arima Madurai ExtraBold Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraBold.ttf)

hhea.ascent: 1073

hhea.lineGap: 0

gasp Table

gasp Table

Pass

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

gasp

Version

gasp table verison should be 1.

Verison = 1

Info

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

gasp

Default

Pull gasp table Default.

Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

gasp

Default

Check gasp table Default.

gasp table default is:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True
and should be:
Grid-fit = True, Do gray = True, Symmetric grid-fit = True, Symmetric smoothing = True

Pass

PostScript names

PostScript names

Pass

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Arima Madurai ExtraLight Regular (ArimaMadurai-ExtraLight.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Arima Madurai Light Regular (ArimaMadurai-Light.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Every PostScript name is fine.

post

Every PostScript name is fine.

Pass

Every PostScript name is fine.

OT Features

OT Features

Error

Arima Madurai Thin Regular (ArimaMadurai-Thin.ttf)

GSUB

sinf

If there is a feature subs, then the sinf feature should be there, too. Otherwise InDesign will mark it not existing.

There is a subs feature in the font, but the sinf is missing. Please investigate.

Warning
